description: Comprehensive ACM Equipment Health Monitoring Dashboard

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 HealthIndex
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1 HealthZone
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1 RUL_Hours
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND (P10_LowerBound IS NOT NULL OR P50_Median IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

SELECT TOP 1 Confidence
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

SELECT TOP 1 fused AS FusedZ
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1 EpisodeCount
FROM ACM_Episodes
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY RunID DESC

SELECT TOP 1
    EquipName AS Equipment,
    FORMAT(StartedAt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS StartedAt,
    COALESCE(DurationSeconds, 0) AS DurationSec,
    COALESCE(ScoreRowCount, 0) AS RowsProcessed,
    HealthStatus AS Status
FROM ACM_Runs
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY StartedAt DESC

SELECT 
    DetectorType AS Detector,
    Severity,
    ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) AS CurrentZ,
    ActiveDefect
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY CurrentZ DESC

panels.description: Health index over time with confidence band forecast

targets.rawSql:
SELECT Timestamp AS time, HealthIndex AS ActualHealth
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT Timestamp AS time, ForecastHealth AS Forecast
FROM ACM_HealthForecast
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND DATEADD(DAY, 7, $__timeTo())
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT Timestamp AS time, CiLower AS CILower
FROM ACM_HealthForecast
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND DATEADD(DAY, 7, $__timeTo())
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT Timestamp AS time, CiUpper AS CIUpper
FROM ACM_HealthForecast
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND DATEADD(DAY, 7, $__timeTo())
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Health Timeline with Forecast

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    HealthZone AS Zone
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    ar1_z AS AR1,
    pca_spe_z AS PCASPE,
    pca_t2_z AS PCAT2,
    iforest_z AS IForest,
    gmm_z AS GMM,
    cusum_z AS CUSUM,
    fused AS Fused
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.description: Top contributing sensors ranked by maximum Z-score

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 10
    SensorName,
    ROUND(MaxAbsZ, 2) AS MaxAbsZ,
    ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) AS LatestZ,
    AboveAlertCount AS Alerts
FROM ACM_SensorHotspots
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY MaxAbsZ DESC

panels.title: Sensor Hotspots

panels.description: Episode culprit sensors by contribution percentage

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 10
    DetectorType,
    ROUND(ContributionPct, 1) AS ContributionPct,
    Rank
FROM ACM_EpisodeCulprits
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC, Rank ASC

panels.title: Episode Culprits

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    RegimeLabel AS Regime
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.description: RUL prediction details with confidence intervals

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1
    ROUND(RUL_Hours, 1) AS RUL_Hours,
    ROUND(P10_LowerBound, 1) AS P10,
    ROUND(P50_Median, 1) AS P50,
    ROUND(P90_UpperBound, 1) AS P90,
    ROUND(Confidence, 3) AS Confidence,
    Method,
    TopSensor1,
    TopSensor2,
    TopSensor3
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND (P10_LowerBound IS NOT NULL OR P50_Median IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

panels.title: RUL Prediction Details

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    FailureProb AS FailureProbability
FROM ACM_FailureForecast
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.description: Recent ACM runs for this equipment

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 20
    FORMAT(StartedAt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS Started,
    DurationSeconds AS Duration,
    TrainRowCount AS TrainRows,
    ScoreRowCount AS ScoreRows,
    EpisodeCount AS Episodes,
    HealthStatus AS Status
FROM ACM_Runs
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY StartedAt DESC

panels.title: Run History

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Section AS Stage,
    AVG(DurationSeconds) AS AvgDuration
FROM ACM_RunTimers
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
GROUP BY Section
ORDER BY AvgDuration DESC

list.definition: SELECT EquipID AS __value, EquipName AS __text FROM Equipment WHERE EquipID > 0 ORDER BY EquipName
list.label: Equipment
list.name: equipment
list.query: SELECT EquipID AS __value, EquipName AS __text FROM Equipment WHERE EquipID > 0 ORDER BY EquipName

title: ACM Equipment Dashboard
